sentences.en: As the evening , wore on the dancing grew more and more uninhabited.
sentences.cn: 天色暗下来以后, 跳舞变得越来越不受拘束了.

sentences.en: For three months the seamen sighted no land except a few desolate , uninhabited islands.
sentences.cn: 三个月以来,水手们除了看到几个荒无人烟的岛屿之外,见不到任何陆地.

sentences.en: His writings demonstrated an unrelenting strength of life through the portrayal of uninhabited romantic atmosphere.
sentences.cn: 他的小说在粗犷的浪漫主义氛围中,呈现出不屈的生命力量.

sentences.en: Lurking in uninhabited places, they slowly gather their strength.
sentences.cn: 他们潜伏在杳无人烟的地方, 慢慢积蓄着力量.

sentences.en: Once a week a barbeque is organised on an uninhabited island.
sentences.cn: 一周组织一次荒岛野炊.
这个地区的大部分荒无人烟。

sentences.en: The best land they could find was an uninhabited swamp.
sentences.cn: 他们所能找到的最佳工地就是一处无人居住的沼泽.
这座岛屿目前无人居住。

sentences.en: The region is uninhabited except for a few scattered mountain villages.
sentences.cn: 除了几个零星的小山村之外,这个地区杳无人烟.

sentences.en: These tribes roved through the uninhabited areas hunting game.
sentences.cn: 这些部族寻找猎物走遍了那无人地区.

sentences.en: Thesurvivor of a shipwreck was washed up on a small, uninhabited island.
sentences.cn: 在一场船难中,唯一的生存者随着潮水, 漂流到一座无人岛上.

sentences.en: Until 30 years ago, it had lain undiscovered , unmined and uninhabited.
sentences.cn: 直到30年前, 这块大陆还未被人发现、未被开采,也无人居住.

sentences.en: Vast areas are arid or semi - desert, and virtually uninhabited.
sentences.cn: 大片地区都是干旱或者半沙漠, 人迹罕至,渺无人烟.

sentences.en: We are not opposed to hot pursuit in uninhabited areas.
sentences.cn: 我们不反对在无人居住的地区穷追猛打.

trans.tran_cn: 无人居住的，无人烟的，荒凉的，杳无人烟，渺无人烟
trans.tran_en: an uninhabited place does not have anyone living there
